summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to community and economic development and job creation in the Central Area; authorizing and providing for the issuance of notes for the purpose of financing a loan for the expansion of Promenade 23 Shopping Center; authorizing a Funding Approval/Agreement and a Contract for Loan Guarantee Assistance with the United States Department of Housing and Urban Development ("HUD") for a Section 108 loan quaranty whereby HUD guarantees repayment of the notes; authorizing related agreements; and creating a special fund.
